ai-tha-ap316:1.3_0: sentient beings are all lovely by the head,
ai-tha-ap316:2.2_0: the benefit of the world in its gods,
ai-tha-ap316:2.3_0: Seeing the danger in both places,
ai-tha-ap316:3.1_0: , going to meet the Awakened One,
ai-tha-ap316:4.1_0: if he makes his four eons;
ai-tha-ap316:4.2_0: it was all over the flower.
ai-tha-ap316:4.3_0: I’m not aware of any living creatures.
ai-tha-ap316:7.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable Padumiya.
ai-tha-ap316:8.1_0: The fourth (directly) after the fourth Elder Padumuttara,
